items.text: full toss down the leg side, the batsman swings and misses but so does the diving keeper and they come through for two, in addition to the wide called by the umpire

items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Carter, no run

items.text: short ball on middle, pulled without much timing and along the ground to midwicket's right
full on off, shuffles across a little and lofts it over mid-off for four
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Carter, FOUR runs

items.text: slower ball, in the slot, hammered flat and hard to long-on's right but Shakib hares across before taking a screamer diving full length to his left

dismissal.text: JL Carter c Shakib Al Hasan b Mustafizur Rahman 11 (36m 17b 1x4 0x6) SR: 64.70

items.text: short ball but down the leg side
slower ball, angled across, tries to heave it to the leg side, gets a thick inside edge to deep squareleg's right for two
full toss on middle, drilled along the ground to long-on
lowe full toss, tailing back in, goes right through him before crashing into middle stump

dismissal.text: KAJ Roach  b Mohammad Saifuddin 1 (6m 2b 0x4 0x6) SR: 50.00
